body_html: It looks like the new version of the Docker file does not set the environmental variables after making the container; it only sets them while making the container and that's why PyTorch/Torch and other framewkros recognize CuDNN while compilation. Setting the environmental variables manually after the container is built fixed the issue. Sorry for the confusions.
